info.name: PrimeTrade Backend Assignment
info.description:
This collection contains REST APIs for authentication, role-based access,  
and task CRUD operations.

All protected routes require:  
Authorization: Bearer

request.description: Explicitly add a admin in database then then login as the user login

Accessible only to users with role: admin.

request.description:
Allows admin to update any task in the system.

Authentication:  
Authorization: Bearer

Request Body:  
{  
"title": "Updated title",  
"description": "Updated description"  
}

Response:  
200 OK  
Returns updated task object.

request.description:
Retrieves all tasks belonging to the authenticated user.

If the logged-in user is an admin,  
all tasks in the system are returned.

Authentication:  
Authorization: Bearer

Response:  
200 OK  
Returns an array of task objects.

request.description:
Updates a specific task.

User can update only their own task.  
Admin can update any task.

Authentication:  
Authorization: Bearer

Request Body:  
{  
"title": "Updated title",  
"description": "Updated description"  
}

Response:  
200 OK  
Returns the updated task.
